section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The initial sentence defines the purpose of the joint venture as "IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service." However, the subsequent sentence grants BorrowMoney.com, inc. the sole discretion to change this purpose at any time. This creates a contradiction, because the stated exclusive purpose is not actually exclusive, as it can be unilaterally altered. This undermines the mutual agreement aspect of a joint venture, suggesting BorrowMoney.com, inc. has significantly more power.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: The first part of the sentence states that each member receives one vote. The second part of the sentence states that BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote. This creates a contradiction because each member does not receive an equal vote.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This section contradicts the fundamental principle of a joint venture, which is based on mutual agreement and benefit. Allowing one member, BorrowMoney.com, inc., to unilaterally amend the agreement regardless of the other member's objections undermines the collaborative nature of the venture. It creates an imbalance of power and could be seen as a breach of good faith.
